duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in tracking participation, attendance, and data points for events and program offerings.
Create professional development guidance for learners including resume templates, cover letter templates, and diversity statement templates.
Assist in creating career development documents and resources to support advertisement and tracking of employment opportunities for learners.
Set up student appointments, industry engagement events, and workshops.
Assist in tracking strategic employer partnerships with the industry.
Create tailored outreach, programming, seminars, workshops, and programs based on student needs assessment and faculty requests.
Collect and report placement data for internships and full-time opportunities.
Assist in developing and coordinating career fairs and affiliated programs.
Maintain individual advising appointments and advisement sessions.
Maintain confidential records and stay committed to diversity in the workplace.
Research factors that may impact the success of the program.
Develop promotional materials and coordinate supervision of interns and/or volunteers.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a bachelor’s degree in Business, Education, Marketing, Human Resources, or related discipline.
